channel.title: Minigame help
channel.description: i was planning on making a mini game were you have to kill 5 npcs in 1 round and round two 10 etc but you have 5 npcs with you the whole time that fight along side you i have some code but i wanted to know what to change to make this possiable so anyone have troll invastion code?

item.title: Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @fasthop10 fasthop10
item.description:
@fasthop10 wrote:

start off by writing round one, your best bet to try to keep your code small so create a universal round creator to keep the code sweet and simple

    public int MAX NPCs = 150;
    public int Round;
    public int RoundPart;
     public void StartRound(int Round){
          if (RoundParts > Roundparts(Round)){


          }
}

public int NpcAmount(int round){
     if (MAXNPCs/5 < Round){
          return (Round *5);
     }else{
          return MAXNPCs;
          
}
}

     public int RoundParts(int Round){
         return (NpcAmount(Round)/5);
}

theres a start of what may be need for this. i can help more later

Read full topic
